# Open Construction Source List for 8 Wing Trenton

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: MX-22636074772
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: OR23SLTR
* **Publication Date**: 2022-12-12
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2026-03-31T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-07-12
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not Available
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not Available
* **Tender Status**: Open

## Tender Notice

The Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is inviting contractors and suppliers to apply to be placed on an Open Construction Source List (OCSL) for commercial, residential, industrial, institutional, and civil work required by the Department of National Defence at 8 Wing Trenton and its satellite sites in Belleville, Peterborough, and Prince Edward County.

## Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible for inclusion on the OCSL, contractors and suppliers must:

* Be a qualified contractor or supplier
* Have a valid MERX account
* Be able to provide the required security clearance(s)
* Meet the stated requirements as outlined in the solicitation/tender documents

## Selection Criteria

The selection criteria for inclusion on the OCSL include:

* Contractor's or supplier's qualifications and experience
* Past performance and references
* Ability to provide the required security clearance(s)

## Invitation to Bid

Once a contractor or supplier has been added to the OCSL, they will receive electronic invitations to bid on upcoming tenders. Contractors and suppliers will be required to submit their bids electronically through MERX.

## Contract Requirements

Contracts awarded by DCC will include measurable performance standards and requirements. Contractors who receive an unacceptable or failing score may be removed from the OCSL and receive no further invitations.

## Organisation and Personnel Security Requirements

Tenders and contracts under this OCSL may contain organization and personnel security requirements. Contractors will be required to hold the required security clearance(s) at the time of closing.

## Requests for Information

Questions regarding the Tender Notice or the OCSL can be directed to:

Jacob Lachapelle, Defence Construction Canada
Jacob.Lachapelle@dcc-cdc.gc.ca

Tender documents and information are available on MERX. A valid MERX account is required to submit bids.
